title: Software Technical Lead
tasks: Lead team of six engineers to redesign and add new features to a multi-platform telemedicine application used to help treat burn victims
Use AWS serverless infrastructure to host BurnCam’s backend & database
Plan bi-weekly sprints, lead development meetings, review/merge code, and ensure team stays on schedule

title: IT Engineering Co-op
tasks: Develop software integration tests on container-based applications in Python and Bash used in Jenkins CI Pipeline for ARIA Cybersecurity appliances and smart NICs
Administer bare-metal and virtual Linux (CentOS, Ubuntu) hosts with ESXi and KVM for software development/testing and daily business operations
Set up demo/test configurations of product deployments for different customer use cases (air-gapped, LAN, and WAN-placed components)
Created and tracked issues using Jira tickets

title: Lead Customer Experience Technician
tasks: Supervised, mentored, and assessed over 100 student employees performing IT Help Desk tasks
Met individually with student employees to discuss performance, raises, and promotions
Created a Spring Boot REST API to streamline annual ethernet and WiFi access point checks throughout Northeastern’s campus
Solved over 500 software, hardware, networking, printing, and account issues experienced by Northeastern students, faculty, and staff
Developed workflows and automations to improve efficiency using Microsoft Power Automate
